column1: Little Goat Diner////Highlights: Pork and toffee shake-- sweet and smoky
column2: rich. I loved the salty bits of toffee. I don't have a huge sweet tooth so this was a good way for me to try something dessert-y that actually appealed to me. Smoked fries-- absolutely perfect
column3: and the smoke flavor is strong. Don't make the mistake of not saving room for these like I did.
